details.description:
List all Projects for an Org.

#### Required permissions

- `View Projects (org.project.read)`

parameters.description: The ID of the org that the projects belong to.
parameters.name: org_id

parameters.description: Return projects that belong to the provided targets
parameters.name: target_id

parameters.description: Return projects that match the provided target reference
parameters.name: target_reference

parameters.description: Return projects that match the provided target file
parameters.name: target_file

parameters.description: Return projects that match the provided target runtime
parameters.name: target_runtime

parameters.description: The collection count.
parameters.name: meta_count

parameters.description: Return projects that match the provided IDs.
parameters.name: ids

parameters.description: Return projects that match the provided names.
parameters.name: names

parameters.description: Return projects with names starting with the specified prefix.
parameters.name: names_start_with

parameters.description: Return projects that match the provided origins.
parameters.name: origins

parameters.description: Return projects that match the provided types.
parameters.name: types

parameters.description: Expand relationships.
parameters.name: expand

parameters.description: Include a summary count for the issues found in the most recent scan of this project
parameters.name: meta.latest_issue_counts

parameters.description: Include the total number of dependencies found in the most recent scan of this project
parameters.name: meta.latest_dependency_total

parameters.description: Filter projects uploaded and monitored before this date (encoded value)
parameters.name: cli_monitored_before

parameters.description: Filter projects uploaded and monitored after this date (encoded value)
parameters.name: cli_monitored_after

parameters.description: Return projects that match the provided importing user public ids.
parameters.name: importing_user_public_id

parameters.description: Return projects that match all the provided tags
parameters.name: tags

parameters.description: Return projects that match all the provided business_criticality value
parameters.name: business_criticality

parameters.description: Return projects that match all the provided environment values
parameters.name: environment

parameters.description: Return projects that match all the provided lifecycle values
parameters.name: lifecycle

200.description: A list of projects is returned for the targeted org

details.summary: List all Projects for an Org with the given Org ID.

details.description:
Delete one project in the organization by project ID.

#### Required permissions

- `View Organization (org.read)`

- `View Projects (org.project.read)`

- `Remove Projects (org.project.delete)`

parameters.description: The ID of the org to which the project belongs to.
parameters.name: org_id

parameters.description: The ID of the project.
parameters.name: project_id

details.description:
Get one project of the organization by project ID.

#### Required permissions

- `View Projects (org.project.read)`

parameters.description: The ID of the org to which the project belongs to.
parameters.name: org_id

parameters.description: The ID of the project.
parameters.name: project_id

parameters.description: Expand relationships.
parameters.name: expand

parameters.description: Include a summary count for the issues found in the most recent scan of this project
parameters.name: meta.latest_issue_counts

parameters.description: Include the total number of dependencies found in the most recent scan of this project
parameters.name: meta.latest_dependency_total

cli_monitored_at.description: The date that the project was last uploaded and monitored using cli.

200.description: A project is returned for the targeted org

details.description:
Updates one project of the organization by project ID.

#### Required permissions

- `View Organization (org.read)`

- `View Projects (org.project.read)`

- `Edit Projects (org.project.edit)`

parameters.description: The ID of the Org the project belongs to.
parameters.name: org_id

parameters.description: The ID of the project to patch.
parameters.name: project_id

parameters.description: Expand relationships.
parameters.name: expand

requestBody.description: The project attributes to be updated.

cli_monitored_at.description: The date that the project was last uploaded and monitored using cli.

200.description: A project is updated for the targeted org

AutoDependencyUpgradeSettings20240531.description: Automatically create pull requests on recurring tests for dependencies as upgrades become available. If not specified, settings will be inherited from the Organization's integration.

ignored_dependencies.description: Dependencies which should NOT be included in an automatic upgrade operation.

is_enabled.description: Automatically raise pull requests to update out-of-date dependencies.

is_inherited.description: Apply the auto dependency integration settings of the Organization to this project.

is_major_upgrade_enabled.description: Include major version in dependency upgrade recommendation.

limit.description: Limit of dependency upgrade PRs which can be opened simultaneously. When the limit is reached, no new upgrade PRs are created. If specified, must be between 1 and 10.

minimum_age.description: Minimum dependency maturity period in days. If specified, must be between 1 and 365.

PullRequestsSettings20240531.description: Settings which describe how pull requests for a project are tested.

fail_only_for_issues_with_fix.description: Only fail when the issues found have a fix available.

is_enabled.description: Test pull requests for vulnerabilities. If this value is unset, the setting is inherited from the org default.

policy.description: Fail if the project has any issues ("all"), or fail if a PR is introducing a new dependency with issues ("only_new"). If this value is unset, the setting is inherited from the org default.

severity_threshold.description: Only fail for issues greater than or equal to the specified severity. If this value is unset, the setting is inherited from the org default.

display_name.description: The human readable name that represents this target. These are generated based on the provided properties, and the source. In the future we may support updating this value.

url.description: The URL for the resource. We do not use this as part of our representation of the identity of the target, as it can      be changed externally to Snyk We are reliant on individual integrations providing us with this value. Currently it is only provided by the CLI

integration_data.description: A collection of properties regarding integration data

PullRequestAssignmentSettings20240531.description: Automatically assign pull requests created by Snyk (limited to private repos). If not specified, settings will be inherited from the Organization's integration.

assignees.description: Manually specify users to assign (and all will be assigned).

is_enabled.description: Automatically assign pull requests created by Snyk.

type.description: Automatically assign the last user to change the manifest file ("auto"), or manually specify a list of users ("manual").

ManualRemediationPRsSettings20240531.description: Manually raise pull requests to fix new and existing vulnerabilities. If not specified, settings will be inherited from the Organization's integration.

is_patch_remediation_enabled.description: Include vulnerability patches in manual pull requests.

created.description: The date that the project was created on

origin.description: The origin the project was added from.

status.description: Describes if a project is currently monitored or it is de-activated.

target_file.description: Path within the target to identify a specific file/directory/image etc. when scanning just part  of the target, and not the entity.

target_reference.description: The additional information required to resolve which revision of the resource should be scanned.

type.description: The package manager of the project.

test_frequency.description: Test frequency of a project. Also controls when automated PRs may be created.

id.description: The public ID of the user that owns the project

RecurringTestsSettings.description: Settings which describe how recurring tests are run for a project.

frequency.description: Test frequency of a project. Also controls when automated PRs may be created.

AutoRemediationPRsSettings20240531.description: Automatically raise pull requests on recurring tests to fix new and existing vulnerabilities. If not specified, settings will be inherited from the Organization's integration.

is_backlog_prs_enabled.description: Automatically create pull requests on scheduled tests for known (backlog) vulnerabilities.

is_fresh_prs_enabled.description: Automatically create pull requests on scheduled tests for new vulnerabilities.

is_patch_remediation_enabled.description: Include vulnerability patches in automatic pull requests.
